nodes.text: Shurg was a Gamorrean male warlord. His clan had taken over an abandoned Czerka Corporation facility on Tatooine. In 3643 BBY, he made a deal with Czerka official Gayem Leksende; he would let Czerka personnel retrieve data they needed from the facility, while his clan would receive weapons and speeders. However, a Galactic Republic citizen, sent by Republic Strategic Information Service operative Fauler to retrieve the data, attacked the abandoned facility. and Shurg was killed in the confrontation.
